description: JSON examples for creating Document Series
note: You need to know the DocumentTypeId first. Check the error message - it mentioned Document Type 'doc2'. You can find the ID by calling GET /api/DocumentTypes

step_1_find_document_type_id.description: Get all document types to find the ID of 'doc2'

step_2_create_document_series.description: Create a new Document Series for Document Type 'doc2' and Project 1
step_2_create_document_series.note: Replace 'documentTypeId' with the actual ID of 'doc2' from step 1

required_fields.documentTypeId: Required - The ID of the Document Type (find it from GET /api/DocumentTypes)
required_fields.projectId: Required - The Project ID (in your case: 1)
required_fields.seriesCode: Required - Unique code for the series (max 50 characters), e.g., 'DOC2-001'
required_fields.isDefault: Optional - Set as default series (default: false)

steps_to_follow: 1. Get Document Type ID: Call GET /api/DocumentTypes and find the ID of 'doc2'
2. Create Document Series: Use POST /api/DocumentSeries with the correct documentTypeId
4. Test Form Submission: Try POST /api/FormSubmissions/draft again
